Posts.Content: Lilkrazy4404 wrote: I had an u/s last week and got referred to a surgeon. That appointment is this Wed. I was curios if anyone else hadthis come up on their u/s and what was your results. Waiting to see the surgeon is dragging I'm so nervous about it. Hypoechoic solid mass with irregular margins with internal flow measuring 8x5x10mm birad 4 suspicious for malignancy. Recommend biopsy. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Hypoechoic solid mass irregular margins Lilkrazy4404 mconibeer
